attributes.title: This App ruined my life
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to support our leader Donald trump but now he keeps showing up and my house at 3 am and leaving Spicy lollypops on my windows. SO UNCOOL 😤 0/10 I do not approve.

attributes.title: AWFUL APP
attributes.review: i expected more from bunker boy and thought this would be a top notch app but it constantly crashes and is so confusing to work. DONT GET IT

attributes.title: this app is AWFUL!!
attributes.review: don’t download this app! i had it on my old phone and it caused it to explode, it is filled with viruses and advertisements! don’t support trump, he will be our downfall! bernie 2020☺️

attributes.title: This app ruined my life
attributes.review: I try to support the prez and all the app dose is glitch and the app is bringing hate into my life it brings hate to my social media and I’m very dissatisfied with this app Donald Jenius Trump. 😔💔🕺🏽💅🏽🧚🏽🦋✨🍃 0/5

attributes.title: Very bad app, very bad
attributes.review: This app is full of bugs and is so slow! Plus, the amount of notifications I get are terrible.

attributes.title: Awful
attributes.review: I am APPALLED THAT THE APP HAS NO FASCIST IMAGES. I only get pictures of bunker boy being a b!tch. Crunchyroll has a better app than you and it crashes all the time. At least on crunchyroll, I get a homosexual supporting cast.

attributes.title: Glitches
attributes.review: I kept waiting for Dictator tRump to say, simply, “Black lives Matter”, but since he never did, I knew there was an issue inherent to the app. Buyer beware!

attributes.title: TRUMP TRAIN COMING THROUGH!! Get on board now!! MAGA 2020
